reviewText:
Off the wall film that has awesomely rare and raw footage of drugs, sex and rock n roll!

It has 3 parts to it. All of them are awesome in their own right.  I particularly like Heroine Highway, which shows how drugs lords in Asia run opium and other serious drugs through the country.

If you want, you can grab it on Amazon's Createspace for a little less. createspace.___/219024 Use the code: ALLXKLKB for 10 percent off.

Cheers!
